entry.title: Wednesday: A few rain showers or flurries. High 12.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with a few flurries changing to a few rain showers near noon. Snow level rising to 2000 metres near noon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries near midnight and ending after midnight then clearing. Snow level 2000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 12.
